resources.string: Tchoutchou
Start new game
Shop
Return
Train Parts
Bronze Upgrade
Faster train, better life
Silver Upgrade
Ideal for hanging out
Gold Upgrade
Faster than light
Options
Quit game
The story of a lifetime
All aboard the hype train!
You\'re about to venture into a lawless path... Do you really want to leave the station?
Hell yeah I’m in! GOING ON AN ADVENTUUUUUURE!
Not today, I’m just gonna chill on Minecraft...
Shout from another world
The story of a man who coughs
You hit the road and arrived at the first station, the trip went well. You hear a voice in the distance while resting from your exhausting journey.
I’d better go check.
Hit & Run!
An unexpected meeting
(Who roams in subways, seriously?)
You find a young man on the tracks. He seems hurt. You wonder whether you should help him or not.
No pity! He’d better move!
Apart from the shady tattoo, he doesn\'t look that bad.
The phantom station
Spookiest place in town
You arrive in a completely deserted station, yet you can see that there have been inhabitants recently.
High risk, high reward! Let’s loot.
*shivers* Not really sure about this one.
The merchant from the depths
Pay and pray
You see lights in the distance, which is quite rare in this area. You slowly approach and realize that they are merchants down there.
Kill and loot!
I’m a smooth talker, king of the deal!
The Reaper
Nothing personal, kid

You heard a legend before you set out on your adventure. The story of a man that cuts his prey in half and leaves only the head. You didn’t think much of it at the time, but now that you’re in front of a graveyard of heads, you’re second-guessing.
That’s bullshit, don’t even think about it.
Gotta go fast!
Every story comes to an end
Sometimes that’s for the best
Is this the promised land? You arrive at the station. Your fantasies quickly fade to nothing but despair. At least you tried...
I should have stayed and played Minecraft.
I came as a stranger and left as a friend.
The cursed station
Rascal rhymes with cabal
During your escape, you take a wrong turn and land in the traitor\'s station, well known for hosting all kinds of rascals.
An happy rascal is an happy client.
All engines on and let it rip!
A new hope
Don\'t sue us, please
It\'s been a few days since you left, and you finally arrive at the first civilized station of your adventure. You take the opportunity to stop and explore.
Check the upgrade store.
Repair your locomotive.
Just turn the engine on, we\’re in a hurry!
It\'s all about timing
And you’re not good at math...
A big boom, a zblah, then a zcraaaatch. In a flash, you lost a wagon and {PASSENGER_NUMBER} passengers died.
Meh, there are plenty more of fish in the sea.
I\'ll bury them myself!
Ghouls.
It’s gonna be a mess
Yeah, you\'re blocked. Your smile gradually fades from your face. It wouldn\'t be so good to get eaten by ghouls.
There\'ll be ghouls for dinner!
*shhh* Let’s sneak for a bit.
Mechanic Joe
A very handy man
You’re shaking in panic when a little man whispers in your ear "is everything all right?". He wears an coverall and has a lot of tools.
You knock him out on reflex. What a fool you\'re.
Do you often whisper in people\'s ears like that?
It\'s all about timing
And you\'re a lucky man
He apologizes for scaring you. To make it up to you, he offers you a free repair.
It tastes better when it’s free!
I’m not a gold digger! *Ghouls are screaming in the distance*
Blood on your hands
Don’t lie, it’s not the first time
Shit happens... You didn\'t mean to kill him, you’re not a murderer, right? Let\'s get back of tracks.
Repair the locomotive.
Throw the body with respect and repair the locomotive.
Let’s play episode 1
I MISSED MINECRAFT SO MUCH
Minecraft.exe... Generating world... Loading chunks... Cheat: Activated... Here we go.
Let’s chop some wood.
You feel like an adventurer today. Let’s explore!
Let’s play episode 2
I ALMOST DIED (SPOOKY)
You come to a cave and hear a skeleton...
Craft a wooden sword and attack!
I’d better stay far from that cave...
Let’s play episode 3
IT’S GETTING HOT
You run into a sexy beach surrounded by mountains. Cosy place.
Home sweet home!
There must be a better spot.
Let’s play episode 4
THERE’S AN INTRUDER IN MY HOUSE
Wow, that sound is getting louder and louder, it almost feels real...
You take off your headset.
Meh, that pipe is probably clogged again.
AFK
I GOTTA GET MY SHIT TOGETHER
There’s a ghoul in front of you, and this game looks freaking real.
*Heroic voice* I regret nothing.
You take the ghoul\'s head and blow it on the computer. The real adventure begins now.
Bad omen
Always leads to bad decision
While you’re throwing the leftovers from your last fight, you find out that they all have the same tatoo on their arms.
Ugh. That’s some bad taste.
I want the same!
The calm before the storm
You’d better wear a raincoat
You’re heading back to your train while noises turn you on. It sounds like animal noises mixed with laughters.
I’m gonna take a look, it must be rats...
I’d better bring out my guns.
CHOO-CHOO, GOODBYE!
A tricky decision
A lose lose situation
You’re surrounded again, and we’re not gonna lie, it doesn’t look good. At least you didn’t met the Reaper... What are you gonna do?
I’m not gonna die today! CHOO-CHOO, attack!
Fleeing away doesn’t necessarily mean being a coward.
Hint: You’re not 1 of the 100s
You wouldn’t wanna be at this precise moment on a daily basis. 100 rascals are roaming in front of you, and it doesn’t look good.
Use your secret weapon. Shhh, We’ll keep it secret.
This red barrel looks very appealing...
One head at a time, they’re all falling down. It shouldn’t be that long.
The rise of the dark side
Still not a space sci-fi game
Genocides are generally bad, but not today. Unfortunately, there are still a few survivors...
Philanthropy first!
My gun game is kinda rusty, let’s train a bit.
Highway to hell
Mom get the camera!
That’s not a bedtime story anymore. *coughs* and that thing smells like shiii... Oow lordy, it’s looking at you now. I don’t want to force your hand but it seems like you’ll have to fight. Ok bye.
I\'m one with the force and the force is with me.
Everything went fine. At least that’s how you feel.
You’re like the king of good choices. You should think about writing a book.
The engine is purring so nicely that you almost fell asleep. What a time to be alive.
Another day goes by. You’re already thinking about tomorrow.
Waaaw, so impressive... You won, yeay...
You\'re dead to me. In fact, you’re dead to everyone.
You feel lucky, chill out for a moment.
Poor boy, the god of misfortune is against you... Obey and prey.
Your Pew Pews got a lot bigger!
I hope you’re good at fist fighting, because that’s all you have now.
Welcome aboard! They’re new people coming in.
Suddenly, you feel a bit more lonely. That’s probably because of the smell of that dead old man laying at the back of the train.
*screams, blood, terror* That was a rough fight. Glad you didn\'t see it.
GOTTA GO FAST! Your Choo-Choo is getting faster and stronger and... cooler!
It’s the same Choo-Choo, but less shiny, and less everything. In fact you’re probably gonna die soon. What a pity.
Your parents are so disappointed. At least you’re alive for now.
Hasta la vista, for now.
